name: The Aspirant
description:
In a world of post-humanity robots; Gezzer, a vacuum cleaner programmed for common tasks, will have an accident that leads him to unlock free will. With such abilities she will experience identity questions, exploration, and decision-making dilemmas on her way to evolution.

Dev Team

  • Jonathan Robert Sopla Campuzano
  • Sebastian Rafael Del Carmen Lopez de Romaña Lopez
  • Luis Gustavo Jesus Palomino Ayala
  • Enrico Santiago Catacora Pando
  • Kathy Christel Vigo Ríos
